trans-unit.source: The type of collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合的類型。

trans-unit.source: This type must be a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> or a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這個型別必須是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 或衍生類別。

trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />, or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> is itself an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable" /> type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 本身就是一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable" /> 型別。

trans-unit.source: This class is provided to enable the creation of custom collection types that fully support data binding, change notification, property invalidation, and animation of its contents.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供要啟用建立的自訂集合型別，完全支援資料繫結變更通知，屬性失效，以及其內容的動畫。

trans-unit.source: XAML Usage for FreezableCollection
trans-unit.target: FreezableCollection 的 XAML 用法

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> supports a limited [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> 支援有限[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]語法。

trans-unit.source: As an object element at the root, you can theoretically specify an unconstrained <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> object element, which must also specify the [x:TypeArguments Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md) to declare the constraint.
trans-unit.target: 在根物件項目，您可以理論上指定受條件約束<xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601>物件項目，也必須指定[X:typearguments 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md)宣告條件約束。

trans-unit.source: However, this is not a common scenario, because to do this, the <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> must be the root element.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這並不常見的案例中，因為若要這樣做，<xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601>必須是根項目。

trans-unit.source: This limitation exists because the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] can only support [x:TypeArguments Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md) when the element it is being set on is the root element, and you must use on any open constraint generic if you want to instantiate a generic type in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這項限制存在是因為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器實作[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]只可支援[X:typearguments 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md)時要設定的項目是根元素，而且您必須使用上任何開啟如果您想要具現化泛型類型中的條件約束泛型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: It is unlikely that you want a <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> as the root element, even as loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 不太可能要<xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601>是根項目，成為鬆散[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> and apply a type constraint in the derived collection, the derived collection can support a variety of usages.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是衍生自<xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601>和套用中將衍生集合的類型條件約束，請將衍生的集合可以支援各種不同的使用方式。

trans-unit.source: This is possible because the constraint in your derivation eliminates the need to pass .
trans-unit.target: 這可能是因為您衍生中的條件約束就不需要傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The typical [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage for such a derived collection is through implicit collection syntax.
trans-unit.target: 一般[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用量這類衍生的集合是透過隱含的集合語法。

trans-unit.source: Collections that support certain interfaces do not need to specify the collection itself as an object element.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定為物件項目集合本身不需要支援特定介面的集合。

trans-unit.source: For details on collection syntax in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，在集合中的語法上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，請參閱[XAML 語法的詳細資料](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。

trans-unit.source: For instance, an *object* with a *property* where the *property* was of type <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> constrained by <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> could support the following syntax:
trans-unit.target: 比方說，*物件*與*屬性*其中*屬性*類型<xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601>受到<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>可以支援下列語法：

trans-unit.source: As long as you do not hide the default constructor, the derived collection can also support an object element syntax (where the object element is explicit, as opposed to the implicit usage shown above).
trans-unit.target: 只要您不要隱藏預設的建構函式，將衍生的集合也可以支援物件項目語法 （其中的物件項目是明確的而不是隱含的使用方式，如上所示）。

trans-unit.source: It does not need to be the root element.
trans-unit.target: 不需要是根項目。

trans-unit.source: Or, you can also use the derived collection as a root element, without needing to specify , although using a collection as a root element is uncommon.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您也可以使用當做根項目，衍生的集合，而不需要指定，雖然使用集合做為根項目是很常見。

trans-unit.source: Any child elements of the collection in either of the above scenarios must be of the type of either the implemented constraint, or as specified by .
trans-unit.target: 在上述案例中擇一集合的任何子項目必須是類型的任一個實作條件約束，或所指定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> that is empty and has the default initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 的新執行個體，其為空白且具有預設的初始容量。

trans-unit.source: The collection whose items should be added to the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 集合，其項目應加入至新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> class that contains the same elements as the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體包含指定集合的相同元素。

trans-unit.source: This operation performs a shallow copy on the specified collection; only references to the collection's elements are copied, the elements themselves are not cloned.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業執行的淺層複本上指定的集合。只複製集合的項目參考，項目本身不會被複製。

trans-unit.source: Modifying an element of the new <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> also modifies that element for `collection`.
trans-unit.target: 修改新的項目<xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601>也會修改針對該項目`collection`。

trans-unit.source: The elements are placed in the new <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> in the same order they are read by the enumerator of the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: 項目會放在新<xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601>讀取指定之集合的列舉值的順序相同。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="collection" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="collection" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A value that is greater than or equal to 0 that specifies the number of elements the new collection can initially store.
trans-unit.target: 大於或等於零 (0) 的值，這個值指定新集合一開始可以儲存的項目數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> that is empty and has the specified initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體是空白且可具有指定的初始容量。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="capacity" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="capacity" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: The object to be added to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 結尾的物件。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified object to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 的尾端。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> is frozen (its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 已凍結 (其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />)。

trans-unit.source: Removes all elements from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除所有項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> and its contents, making deep copies.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 和其內容的可修改複本，來製作深層複本。

trans-unit.source: If this collection (or its contents) has animated dependency properties, the property’s base value is copied, not its current animated value.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個集合 (或其內容) 具有動畫相依性屬性，則會複製屬性的基底值，但不會複製目前的動畫值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable copy of this collection and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合和其內容的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The copy's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 複本的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method shadows the inherited <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with a strongly typed implementation for convenience.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會遮蔽繼承<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方便以強類型實作方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a clone (deep copy) of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> using base (non-animated) property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用基底 (非動畫) 屬性值，將這個執行個體變成所指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 的複製品 (深層複本)。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Clone%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Clone%2A>方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Clone%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立目前物件的可修改複本，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Clone%2A>而不是直接呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: See the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore(System.Windows.Freezable)" /> page for information about when you should override this method.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<see cref="M:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore(System.Windows.Freezable)" />頁面以取得關於何時應該覆寫這個方法的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> and its contents, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 和其內容的可修改複本，以製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: If this object (or the objects it contains) contains animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個物件 (或其包含的物件) 含有動畫相依性屬性，則會複製這些屬性的目前動畫值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the collection and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合和其內容的可修改複製品。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method shadows the inherited <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with a strongly typed implementation for convenience.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會遮蔽繼承<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方便以強類型實作方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> to clone.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a modifiable clone (deep copy) of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> using current property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用目前的屬性值，將這個執行個體設為所指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 的可修改複製品 (深層複本)。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.CloneCurrentValue%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.CloneCurrentValue%2A>方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.CloneCurrentValue%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立目前物件的可修改複本，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.CloneCurrentValue%2A>而不是直接呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: See the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore(System.Windows.Freezable)" /> page for information about when you should override this method.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<see cref="M:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore(System.Windows.Freezable)" />頁面以取得關於何時應該覆寫這個方法的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在此集合中搜尋的物件。

trans-unit.source: This object may be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件可能為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> contains the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 判斷這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 是否包含指定的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if value is found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 中找到值則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 一維陣列，是從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 複製過來之項目的目的端。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>array</c> 中以零起始的索引，複製作業從此處開始。

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> to a compatible one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 從目標陣列的指定索引處開始，將整個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 複製到相容的一維陣列中。

trans-unit.source: Note that this operation performs a shallow copy.
trans-unit.target: 請注意這項作業執行的淺層複本。

trans-unit.source: The elements are copied to the target array in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through this <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 將元素複製到目標陣列的列舉值會逐一這樣的順序相同<xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the source <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 中的元素數目大於從索引至目的端 <paramref name="array" /> 結尾的可用空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 所包含的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 所包含的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation).
trans-unit.target: 請勿呼叫這個方法，直接 （只是呼叫基底實作中）。

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstance%2A>, whenever a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> is created.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法在內部呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstance%2A>，每當的新執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>建立。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a typical implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範典型實作<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Every <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> subclass must implement this method.
trans-unit.target: 每個<see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />子類別必須實作這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Typical implementation is to simply call the class default constructor and return the result.
trans-unit.target: 一般的實作會直接呼叫類別預設建構函式，並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> should simply return whether it can be frozen.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 只應傳回其是否可凍結則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> instance should actually freeze itself when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法時，如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 執行個體應該實際凍結自身則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> object unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 物件設定為不可修改，或決定是否可以將它設定為不可修改。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="isChecking" /> is <see langword="true" />, this method returns <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> can be made unmodifiable, or <see langword="false" /> if it cannot be made unmodifiable.
trans-unit.target: 當 <paramref name="isChecking" /> 為 <see langword="true" /> 時，如果可以將這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 設定為不可修改，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="true" />，如果無法設定為不可修改，則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="isChecking" /> is <see langword="false" />, this method returns <see langword="true" /> if the if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> is now unmodifiable, or <see langword="false" /> if it cannot be made unmodifiable, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="isChecking" /> 是 <see langword="false" />，則當指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 現在已經是不可修改時，這個方法會傳回 <see langword="true" />，如果它不可以成為不可修改，則會傳回 <see langword="false" />，而副作用是會開始變更這個物件的凍結狀態。

trans-unit.source: Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation).
trans-unit.target: 請勿呼叫這個方法，直接 （只是呼叫基底實作中）。

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CanFreeze%2A> (with `isChecking` equal to `true`) and <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Freeze%2A> (with `isChecking` equal to `false`).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法在內部呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CanFreeze%2A>(與`isChecking`等於`true`) 和<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Freeze%2A>(與`isChecking`等於`false`)。

trans-unit.source: For information about when to override this method, see <see cref="M:System.Windows.Freezable.FreezeCore(System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需何時覆寫這個方法的資訊，請參閱<see cref="M:System.Windows.Freezable.FreezeCore(System.Boolean)" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> using base (non-animated) property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用基底 (非動畫) 屬性值，將這個執行個體設為所指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 的凍結複製品。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>和不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立目前物件的凍結的複本，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>而不是直接呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: For information about when to override this method, see <see cref="M:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore(System.Windows.Freezable)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需何時覆寫這個方法的資訊，請參閱<see cref="M:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore(System.Windows.Freezable)" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />.
trans-unit.target: 將這個執行個體製作為指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 的凍結複本。

trans-unit.source: If this object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個物件具有動畫相依性屬性，則會複製這些屬性的目前動畫值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>和不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立目前物件的凍結的複本，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>而不是直接呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: For information about when to override this method, see <see cref="M:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore(System.Windows.Freezable)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需何時覆寫這個方法的資訊，請參閱<see cref="M:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore(System.Windows.Freezable)" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for the entire <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回整個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 的列舉程式。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for the entire <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 整個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的物件，並傳回整個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 中第一個出現之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the entire <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 整個 <paramref name="value" /> 中第一個出現 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 之以零為起始的索引 (如有找到)，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <c>value</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 應該插入 <c>value</c> 之以零啟始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The object to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的物件。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified object into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將指定物件插入位於指定索引的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than <see cref="P:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1.Count" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> is frozen (its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 已凍結 (其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />)。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要取得或設定之以零為起始的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的索引位置上取得或設定項目。

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引上的項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than <see cref="P:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 等於或大於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1.Count" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified element is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的項目為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set an item in the collection when the collection is frozen (its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />).
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在凍結的集合 (其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />) 中設定項目。

trans-unit.source: The object to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的物件。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of the specified object from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 中移除指定之物件的第一個符合項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> was found in the collection and removed; <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="value" /> could not be found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果在集合中找到 <paramref name="value" /> 的符合項目並將其移除則為 <see langword="true" />，如果在集合中找不到 <paramref name="value" /> 則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> is frozen (its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 已凍結 (其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />)。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the object to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的物件之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the object at the specified zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 指定之以零起始的索引處移除物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than <see cref="P:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1.Count" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> is frozen (its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 已凍結 (其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />)。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是唯讀，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1.GetEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1" /> 物件，可用於逐一查看集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the copied items from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> 接收複製項目的以零為起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The first position in the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的第一個位置，將接收複製來的內容。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> has a fixed size; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 有固定大小，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是唯讀，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要取得或設定之以零為起始的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.Item(System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.Item(System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引上的項目。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 要從 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FreezableCollection`1" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)" />。
